table.name: vtiger_catalogoriesgos
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_catalogoriesgos` ( `catalogoriesgosid` int(11) NOT NULL, `descriesgo` text default NULL, `refriesgo` varchar(25) default NULL, `catriesgo` varchar(125) default NULL, `tiporiesgo` varchar(125) default NULL, `descamenaza` text default NULL, `refamenaza` varchar(25) default NULL, `catamenaza` varchar(125) default NULL, `tipoamenaza` varchar(125) default NULL, `catalogoriesgos_no` varchar(50) default NULL, `refcontrol` varchar(250) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`catalogoriesgosid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_catalogoriesgoscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_catalogoriesgoscf` ( `catalogoriesgosid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`catalogoriesgosid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
